oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and experimental evaluation of piecewise output feedback control for structural vibration suppression
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: EZHILARASI, D
UMAPATHY, M
BANDYOPADHYAY, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: smart structures
simultaneous stabilization
actuators

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents the design and the experimental implementation of fast and periodic output feedback controllers to minimize structural vibration, using collocated piezoelectric actuators and sensors. A linear dynamic model of the smart cantilever beam is obtained using online recursive least squares parameter estimation. A digital control system that consists of simulink modeling software and a dSPACE1104 controller board has been used for identification and control. The effectiveness of the controllers is shown experimentally by exciting the structure at resonance.
